Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Enacts the "building retention and internship-to-degree graduate employment (BRIDGE) act"
Summary: Enacts the "building retention and internship-to-degree graduate employment (BRIDGE) act"; provides limited work permits for students in a master of social work program; establishes policies and procedures for such work permit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "building retention and internship-to-degree graduate employment (BRIDGE) act"
